snippet: NerdWallet.com’s new tool compares 300 different fees, including for checked baggage, seat selection, priority boarding, carrying a pet on board and booking over the phone.
abstract: NerdWallet.com’s new tool compares 300 different fees, including for checked baggage, seat selection, priority boarding, carrying a pet on board and booking over the phone.

headline.main: A New Tool to Compare Airline Fees
